source.query:
SELECT
	 "L_RETURNFLAG",
	 "L_LINESTATUS",
	 "L_SHIPINSTRUCT",
	 "L_SHIPMODE",
	 "L_COMMENT",
	 sum("L_ORDERKEY") AS "L_ORDERKEY",
	 sum("L_PARTKEY") AS "L_PARTKEY",
	 sum("L_SUPPKEY") AS "L_SUPPKEY",
	 sum("L_LINENUMBER") AS "L_LINENUMBER",
	 sum("L_QUANTITY") AS "L_QUANTITY",
	 sum("L_EXTENDEDPRICE") AS "L_EXTENDEDPRICE",
	 sum("L_DISCOUNT") AS "L_DISCOUNT",
	 sum("L_TAX") AS "L_TAX",
	 count("L_SHIPDATE") AS "L_SHIPDATE",
	 count("L_COMMITDATE") AS "L_COMMITDATE",
	 count("L_RECEIPTDATE") AS "L_RECEIPTDATE" 
FROM "_SYS_BIC"."HAHANA/TESTANALV" 
GROUP BY "L_RETURNFLAG",
	 "L_LINESTATUS",
	 "L_SHIPINSTRUCT",
	 "L_SHIPMODE",
	 "L_COMMENT"
